Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora to moderate turn. Clay fine purple brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 184, 8 is close, but not the same. Name Marsyas. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0684.30.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0805)
